author: Anthony Migliazzo
note: Weights and scale definitions in this file are pre-committed. No silent revisions. All changes must be logged in the revision_record below with date, change, and rationale.

principles.composite_independence: World On Edge and World Goodness are independently constructed. Goodness ≠ 100 − Edge. They draw from distinct input pools with separately justified weights.
principles.normalization: All inputs normalized to 0–100 before weighting is applied.
principles.revision_discipline: Weights may only change with a logged revision entry. Retroactive adjustment to match narrative is prohibited.
principles.descriptive_not_prescriptive: Anthony Charts measures directional change. It does not forecast outcomes or prescribe action.

inputs.name: GPR Index
inputs.source: Caldara & Iacoviello — geopolitical risk language across 10 major global newspapers
inputs.normalization: GPR raw value normalized against 0–200 historical range

inputs.name: ACLED Active Conflict Event Count
inputs.source: Armed Conflict Location & Event Data Project
inputs.normalization: Active conflict zones normalized against 0–80 historical range

inputs.name: Gallup Global Worry & Stress Survey
inputs.source: Gallup World Poll annual negative experience index
inputs.normalization: Worry index normalized 0–100 as published

inputs.name: Conflict Deaths YTD
inputs.source: ACLED cross-referenced with UCDP Uppsala — direct battle fatalities only
inputs.normalization: YTD deaths normalized against 50,000 annual threshold (extreme)

inputs.name: Species Threat Index (inverted)
inputs.source: IUCN Red List — threatened species as % of total assessed, inverted as stress signal
inputs.normalization: Threatened % normalized against 0–50% scale

world_goodness.name: World Goodness Index

inputs.name: OCHA Humanitarian Aid Volume
inputs.source: UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs — total aid commitments
inputs.normalization: Aid volume normalized against 0–30B USD annual range

inputs.name: World Bank Extreme Poverty Rate (inverted)
inputs.source: World Bank — % living below $2.15/day PPP, inverted (lower poverty = higher goodness)
inputs.normalization: Poverty rate inverted: goodness = 100 − normalized poverty %

inputs.name: Scientific Breakthrough Count
inputs.source: Our World in Data — peer-reviewed major scientific milestone tracking
inputs.normalization: Annual breakthrough count normalized against 0–50 range

inputs.name: UN Treaty Signatures Per Quarter
inputs.source: UN Treaty Collection database — multilateral treaty ratifications
inputs.normalization: Quarterly signatures normalized against 0–30 historical range

inputs.name: Social Mobility Index
inputs.source: World Bank Global Social Mobility Index — 10 pillars including health, education, fair wages
inputs.normalization: Published 0–100 scale used directly

inputs.name: Conservation Coverage Growth Rate
inputs.source: Protected Planet (UNEP-WCMC + IUCN) — % of Earth's land under formal protection
inputs.normalization: Coverage % normalized as share of 30x30 target (30% by 2030)

world_goodness.arc_scale: 0 = no positive momentum / 100 = maximum positive momentum

calm_window.name: Calm Window Probability
calm_window.direction: Higher = greater probability of directional tension easing
calm_window.disclaimer: Probabilistic directional easing estimate — not predictive certainty. This is not a prediction of peace.

inputs.name: GPR 3-Month Slope
inputs.source: Caldara & Iacoviello GPR Index — 3-month directional momentum
inputs.normalization: Rising slope scores lower (less calm probable); falling slope scores higher

inputs.name: ACLED Conflict Event Trend
inputs.source: ACLED — month-over-month change in active conflict event count
inputs.normalization: Growing event counts score lower; declining counts score higher

inputs.name: Volatility Compression Signal
inputs.source: GPR standard deviation — sharp downward momentum = structural easing signal
inputs.normalization: High compression (sharp fall) scores higher; noise-level change scores lower

calm_window.arc_scale: 0 = near-zero easing probability / 100 = high easing probability

information_integrity.name: Information Integrity Index

inputs.name: IFCN Claim Accuracy Rate
inputs.source: International Fact-Checking Network — verified fact-checker claim accuracy
inputs.normalization: Accuracy % used directly as 0–100

inputs.name: RSF Press Freedom Index (inverted)
inputs.source: Reporters Without Borders — global press freedom score, inverted
inputs.normalization: RSF score inverted: higher freedom = higher integrity signal

inputs.name: NewsGuard Credibility Score Average
inputs.source: NewsGuard — average credibility rating across major news sources
inputs.normalization: Published 0–100 score used directly

information_integrity.arc_scale: 0 = total misinformation environment / 100 = fully verified environment

inputs.name: Freightos Baltic Index
inputs.source: Freightos — global container freight rate benchmark
inputs.normalization: Freight rates normalized against 0–15,000 USD/FEU historical range

inputs.name: Global Manufacturing PMI (inverted)
inputs.source: S&P Global Manufacturing PMI composite — inverted (contraction = higher stress)
inputs.normalization: PMI inverted: below 50 = contraction = higher stress score

inputs.name: World Bank Trade Volume Momentum
inputs.source: World Bank — global trade volume index month-over-month momentum
inputs.normalization: Declining momentum scores higher stress; growth scores lower

arctic_sea_ice.arc_basis: Percentile within 1981–2010 climatological seasonal range for same calendar day

co2_concentration.arc_basis: 280ppm pre-industrial baseline to 500ppm extreme risk scenario
co2_concentration.source: NOAA Mauna Loa Observatory + Scripps Institution

exoplanet_count.arc_basis: Pace toward 10,000-planet milestone by 2030 at current discovery rates

neo_watch.unit: close approaches within 0.05 AU this week
neo_watch.note: Awareness meter — not a threat alarm. Impact threats tracked separately.

technosignature_watch.arc_basis: Candidates as share of 12-month rolling average
technosignature_watch.note: Scientific search tracker — not a claimed detection meter.

social_mobility.source: World Bank Global Social Mobility Index

conflict_deaths.note: Direct battle fatalities only. Indirect deaths from disease or displacement excluded.

species_threat.unit: species classified VU/EN/CR on IUCN Red List
species_threat.arc_basis: Threatened as % of total assessed, normalized against 50% threshold

conservation_coverage.unit: % of Earth's land under formal protection
conservation_coverage.arc_basis: % of 30x30 target (30% by 2030, agreed COP15 2022) achieved

changes: Platform launched with 17 meters across 4 pillars
World On Edge expanded from 3 to 5 inputs — conflict deaths and species threat added, GPR weight reduced from 0.50 to 0.35
World Goodness expanded from 4 to 6 inputs — social mobility and conservation coverage added
Composite Independence principle established: Edge and Goodness are not inverses
Calm Window, Information Integrity, and Trade Stress designated Experimental
All arc scales pre-declared and locked
revision_record.rationale: Initial publication. All weights set by editorial judgment at launch.
